title: Sora-Sama Wants To Be Satisfied!
alternative_title: ソラさまは満たされたい！ ; Sora-sama wa Mitasaretai! ; SORA wanna be satisfied
status: ソラさまは満たされたい！ ; Sora-sama wa Mitasaretai! ; SORA wanna be satisfied
description:
Description :
        Hoshino Star, a male high school student who lives leisurely in the countryside, has a unique power—that is, being able to get along with any animal! Although Hoshi spends his days feeling supreme joy in interacting with animals, on the other hand, he also has a great dislike of humans. Kirari Yozora, a childhood friend who struggles with her extreme personality, suddenly thinks one day. ──What would Hoshi think if there were animals like humans?At that time, a mysterious object comes flying with a roaring sound. Appearing from the other side of the dust cloud is the most terrifying and worst visitor with cute fur ears and a tail. A genius tamer VS greedy kemomimi unfolds in this relaxing erotic comedy!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: I'll Wash You Both (Uncensored)
